00019 #include <qdialog.h>
00020 #include <qlayout.h>
00021 #include <qlabel.h>
00022 #include <qpushbutton.h>
00023 
00024 #include "config.h"
00025 #include "globalCloseDialog.h"
00026 
00027 GlobalCloseDialog::GlobalCloseDialog(QWidget *parent, const char *name) : QDialog(parent, name)
00028 {
00029     setCaption("Close Client");
00030 
00031     vBoxLayout = new QVBoxLayout(this, 5, 5, "globalCloseDialog::vBoxLayout");
00032 
00033     label = new QLabel("<nobr>There are entries in the journal which have not been saved and cleared.</nobr><br>"
00034                        "<nobr>Would you like to save and clear these entries now?</nobr><br><br>"
00035                        "Note: if you do not save and clear these entries, "
00036                        "they will <u>not</u> be lost.  You will find them "
00037                        "in the same place when you open this client again.", this, "globalCloseDialog::label");
00038 
00039     vBoxLayout->addWidget(label);
00040     vBoxLayout->addSpacing(10);
00041 
00042     hBoxLayout = new QHBoxLayout(vBoxLayout, 5, "globalCloseDialog::hBoxLayout");
00043 
00044     saveButton = new QPushButton(QIconSet(QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/saveAndClear.png")),
00045                                  "Save and Clear Entries", this, "globalCloseDialog::saveButton");
00046     connect(saveButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(saveAndClear()));
00047 
00048     dontSaveButton = new QPushButton(QIconSet(QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/cancelButton.png")),
00049                                      "Don't Save and Clear", this, "globalCloseDialog::dontSaveButton");
00050     connect(dontSaveButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(dontSave()));
00051 
00052     returnButton = new QPushButton(QIconSet(QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/returnToJournal.png")),
00053                                    "Return to Journal Entry", this, "globalCloseDialog::returnButton");
00054     connect(returnButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(retToEntry()));
00055 
00056     returnButton->setDefault(true);
00057     returnButton->setFocus();
00058 
00059     hBoxLayout->addStretch();
00060     hBoxLayout->addWidget(saveButton);
00061     hBoxLayout->addWidget(dontSaveButton);
00062     hBoxLayout->addWidget(returnButton);
00063 }
00064 
00065 void GlobalCloseDialog::saveAndClear()
00066 {
00067     done(0);
00068 }
00069 
00070 void GlobalCloseDialog::dontSave()
00071 {
00072     done(1);
00073 }
00074 
00075 void GlobalCloseDialog::retToEntry()
00076 {
00077     done(2);
00078 }
